title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for the description

Slopes are negative at points (x, y) where x ≠ 0 and y<2.
descriptions:
The student response earns none of the following points:

1 point is earned for the description

Slopes are negative at points (x, y) where x ≠ 0 and y<2.

The student response earns one of the following points:

1 point is earned for the description

Slopes are negative at points (x, y) where x ≠ 0 and y<2.
